resources.string:
FitShark Application 
This application is build for Fitness freak people who wants to exercise even staying at home. They can have everyday execise log pre planned and can edit them accordingly. 

 Submission Date: 2021-12-09 Student Name: 
 
 Snehal Patel - 991536967 
 Aman Jasani - 991516032 
 Om Patel - 991541635

In the Application user will have to create their account and login with it.
 Here they will have 3 options in the screen. 
		Add Exercise Log 
 Onclicking you will be redirect to other screen where you will create a exercise log and add an exercise with time and some description to it. As soon as you click on the add button you will be send to View Exercise log. 
		View Exercise Log 
 On clicking you will be redirect to other screen which is View Exercise log screen. Here you will be able to delete,view or edit any log created by you. To edit just click on the item anywhere and to delete click on the delete or cross button provided there. 
		BMI Calculator 
 On Clicking you will be redirect to Bmi Calculator screen. Here you can calculate you BMI score and get feedback about your score.
